titles.title: God's Love Is Big Enough, Long Enough

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God's love is big enough, long enough
God is strong enough to finish this work He has begun.
He'll do exceedingly, abundantly above all we ask or think.
To Him be glory in the church.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So I will clap my hands, sing and shout;
I will dance about, this body giving glory to the Lord.
There is no foe too strong or tough, for God is big enough,
And I will praise the Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are the Lord of lords and King of kings,
We lift our hands and sing.
You are the precious Lamb of God.
The Lord of lords and King of kings, Father unto You I sing.
Yes, I will praise the Lord.
